update.name: Mi File Explorer v3.1.6 (201303072)
update.log: - Fixed some mistakes in files operations. - Fixed visibility of time remained and bytes per seconds in operation dialog. - Fixed opening and saving text file bug on FTP client. - Optimized FTP Client for better performance (Not works perfect yet) - Fixed a bug on files selection. - Added copying files to folders which is not writable like "/Data" when using FTP Server. - Updated some languages
